actions.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendments (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments limit funding for the Government of the Russian Federation to $172 million and prohibit funding to purchase equipment or products made in a country other than the foreign government receiving assistance or the United States.
purpose: An amendment to limit funding for the Government of the Russian Federation to $172 million and prohibit funding to purchase equipment or products made in a country other than the foreign government receiving assistance or the United States.
